DOC.brief_summary: The purpose protocol study two different tablet formulation doxycycline bioequivalent .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Between Two Tablet Formulations Of Doxycycline Carragenate
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 . Evidence history clinically significant abnormality . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption . A positive urine drug screen .
